page.title: 03SCHOOL GARDEN
page.content: At the Down School, we have school {garden plots,}tended by a group of us. We bring our own plants and look after them. { : : : : : : : : : : : : In our garden we have snap-dragons, pinks, strawberries, jasmine and a grape vine. Last year this had small grapes, but they weren't fit to eat. Another garden plot has its own {pond,}with water lilies and plants in it, as well as two goldfish at present. At the end of the school-year, Mr. Vincent judges the{best kept garden, and there is a prize for that group. Also, we are having a{sunflower } {competition}this year to see who can grow the tallest one. The{weather}has been bad for sunflowers, and the pigeons have taken quite a few.
